alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 2:30PM PST until November 23 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. The higher mountains may get two to five inches of snow. Heaviest ice amounts will be at the base of the Blue Mountains near Elgin with just a few hundredths of an inch elsewhere. * WHERE...Wallowa County and Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County
